Room 5 again this Sunday

By Krister Axel on 03/22 2012 at 16_04 in Journal News Saga

more fun with guitars and microphones.

8pm - Casey Wickstrom 8:15 - Michael Doman 8:30 - Ryan Darton 8:45 - Dawn Mitschele 9pm - Patrick Joseph 9:10 - Kathryn Gallagher 9:20 - Shevy Smith 9:30 - Marvin Etzioni 9:40 - Krister Axel 10pm - Rafe Pearlman
10:10 - Jenni Alpert 10:20 - Ariana Hall

She wasn't on the original list (I guess), but Stevie Ann also played and she was great.

Room 5 - upstairs at Amalfi Restaurant 143 N. La Brea Ave
